amo_description.message:
QR Lite is a simple browser extension for generating and scanning QR codes offline. Features:
  • Generate QR code for the current tab.
  • Generate QR code for selected link/text.
  • Generate QR code for user entered text.
  • Scan QR code in images.
  • Scan QR code in choosen screen region.
  • Scan QR code with camera.
  • View generating and scanning history, up to 100 items.
